author: Björn Ritzl
description: A system to create styled text based on an HTML inspired markup language
name: Rich Text

releases.message: FIX: Make sure to not leak nodes when doing a dry-run. Thanks @8bitskull
NEW: Information about mismatching tags now include the entire text and a stack trace to help with debugging of incorrectly formatted text.
FIX: Justified text alignment did not treat last line and lines ending in a line break correctly.
FIX: Fonts were not applied properly in custom tags. Thanks @abadonna
NEW: The message generated by a successful call to `richtext.on_click()` will now also contain the tags of the clicked word.

FIX: Combine words regression introduced in 5.20.0
FIX: Text nodes were given the incorrect size when the text was scaled

NEW: Added `richtext.plaintext(words)` to convert words back to a plan text string without formatting
NEW: Added `dryrun` boolean option to `richtext.create()` to parse a text, create words and perform layout but not create the gui nodes
NEW: The `` tag accepts an optional fixed width and height for the image: ``. Thanks to @dblumin45 for the contribution!

NEW: Added support for custom tags
NEW: Added default `size` as a new settings value
FIX: End tag detection was greedy and could encapsulate multiple tags

NEW: Split very long text to fit max width of a line (#67)
NEW: Unknown tags are still set on the words. This can be used in a separate step to do additional processing of the text or to get all words with a custom tag using `richtext.tagged(words, tag)` (#60)
FIX: Spacing between words was too big (#70)
FIX: The word spacing when using ALIGN_JUSTIFY was not correct when one or more words have zero width
NEW: Added richtext.remove(words) to remove previously created words (nodes). Thanks to @8bitskull
NEW: Added `<repeat=count>text</repeat>` tag to repeat enclosed text

FIX: Empty tags were incorrectly merged with the words prior to the tag
NEW: Image and spine count is returned in text metrics
NEW: Support for custom named colors
NEW: Added vertical align setting for the words on each line

NEW: Added support for `

` paragraph tags. Thanks @dapetcu21 !
NEW: richtext.ALIGN_JUSTIFY

FIX: Zero-width space should be treated as individual words
FIX: Cleaned up examples
FIX: The recent parser changes sometimes generated additional empty words. Fixes #49
NEW: Added zero-width space character support via custom HTML entity &zwsp;

CHANGE: `richtext.truncate()` now has an options table as a third argument and an option to truncate on a per word basis instead of per character. The length will in this case indicate how many words to show instead of how many characters.
CHANGE: RichText now supports nested and overlapping tags.
NEW: Added support for a limited set of HTML entities (`> < and  `)
NEW: Added shadow and outline tags (`<shadow=color>foobar</shadow>` and `<outline=color>foobar</outline>`)
FIX: Combined words now correctly calculate line length
NEW: Added support for combining words of the same style on a line into a single node to reduce node count. This is achieved by passing `combine_words = true` in the settings.
FIX: Zero width metrics didn't apply the word size to the metrics height which results in linebreaks of the wrong height
CHANGE: Text nodes now also get their outline set to the same color as the fill color.
NEW: UTF8 support. Thanks Dmitriy!

NEW: Added support for the `a` anchor tab to easily handle clickable words
FIX: Generated nodes are assigned unique ids
FIX: Empty lines didn't get the proper text metrics for height. This caused problems with multiple consecutive linebreaks
NEW: Added `<nobr>` tag to let words overflow on a line without breaking

BREAKING CHANGE: The truncate() function updates the metrics of a node
CHANGE: truncate() returns the last visible word
BREAKING CHANGE: All nodes now have inherit alpha set to true (requires Defold 1.2.124)

NEW: Tag parameters are now accessible per word:

```
<foo=bar>Defold</foo>

print(word.text, word.tags.foo) -- Defold  bar
```

NEW: Added support for a new setting `image_pixel_grid_snap` to snap images to full pixels to avoid certain anti-aliasing effects
CHANGE: Images are now affected by `<size>` tags
NEW: Added support for assigning layers to generated nodes to reduce draw calls.
NEW: Added support for `<spine=scene:anim\>` tags

NEW: Added `line_spacing` option to richtext.create() settings. This is a scaling value for line height. Set to 1.0 for default spacing. Less than 1.0 to decrease and more than 1.0 to increase spacing.

FIX: Text metrics for words with trailing space were wrong
FIX: Line height was wrong after a line break
FIX: Make sure to properly handle \r\n (throw away all \r's)
FIX: `` tags were broken

NEW: Added support for splitting a word into it's individual characters. Useful when creating character effects on specific words.
FIX: Parsing of nested tags could result in empty "words"
FIX: Typo caused bug while parsing rich text

NEW: richtext.truncate(words, length)
NEW: richtext.length(text)
FIX: Text measurement was incorrect if initial position was negative
